form.name: form1

p.span: for the latest COVID-19 related information.Â

td.br: If you have already requested a chromebook but have been unable to pick it up, or you would like to submit a new request for a chromebook, please send en email message to Jeffrey Johnson (johnsonj@psarrows.com) to make pickup arrangements or obtain a link to the request form.Â

Governor DeWine announced this afternoon that we will not be returning to school for the rest of this school year. We will continue with our Remote Learning Assignments. We will be working on one more distribution to get us through the end of the year. Details will be forthcoming. Spring athletics will be cancelled as a result of this decision. We will still need guidance for events such as graduation and prom that have large numbers of people attending in close quarters. We will communicate details of those events when we know more. For our students and seniors, we wish the circumstances we find ourselves in were different. When given the opportunity, we will make sure the events that are left will be memorable. Please continue to visit our website www.psarrows.com for information.Â

Remote Learning Assignment Grading Information
Â Â

Preble Shawnee Schools will have a limited number of Chromebooks available for students with limited resources for online learning. We are now able to offer devices to students in grades 7-12. An email was sent this afternoon (4/16/20) to the school email accounts of our 7th through 10th graders with directions on how to request a device. The devices are scheduled to be distributed on Monday, April 20th. Once those devices are distributed, we will continue to move down to lower grade levels.
*11th and 12th graders are still able to request devices...just follow the directions sent to the student email accounts
